Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • GamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class GamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    GamePanel has the function of making the panel for our game. GamePanel draws the background for the stage. It has the function to paint. It declares the walls, makes them the color blue and so on.
    Version:
    2021. 5. 27.
    Author:
    Bedri, Richie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
